>
> Poor Galio. I think some people actually forget he is even a champion in the game.

I have spent so much time imagining and theorizing Galio changes...

Seriously, he could be the coolest Paladin Gargoyle ever conceived, especially as a foil to Sion.

At the same time, I want Riot to hold off on it, because I'm working towards applying to Riot and I wanna work on Galio >_>

We will try, but we can only hold off for so long :P

That guy needs some love.

Paladin Gargoyle?  

Fuck yes.  Do this.

Damn, I really like your juxtaposition with Sion.
{{champion:3}} is an immortal gargoyle that defends Demacia because he wants to protect its people.
{{champion:14}} is an undead zombie that has been brought back to life against his will to fight for Noxus.
They do really describe the differences between the two city-states!
Sion actually has a line when facing an enemy Galio.

What are _your_ thoughts about a possible mechanic where Galio has the ability to climb turret and actually be, well, _a Gargoyle guardian?_
I mean he could have all sorts of effects after climbing a turret, such as increasing his sight-range, letting him dive towards an area/ally from the turret in an area around it, etc.
He has so much potential and I'd love if someone who's passionate about Galio got to work on him. :D

Good luck with applying (Always keep trying!), I really hope you get the job, for I have a feeling you have some really good ideas for our favorite _forgotten Gargoyle guardian._

I mean Shen for example didn't get a big update,but he still got one.

{{champion:43}} 
The Karma re-rework.

Her tether really needs an allied effect so she has two enemy and two ally spells.

Imagine:
Focused Resolve
ACTIVE: Karma forms a tether between her and the target champion champion or monster, enemies are dealt magic damage over 2 seconds at 0.66-second intervals and granting True Sight icon true sight of them for the duration, **allies take reduced damage while tethered.
**If an enemy target does not break the tether by moving out of range, they are rooted for a short time.

MAGIC DAMAGE: 60 / 110 / 160 / 210 / 260 (+ 90% AP)
DAMAGE REDUCTION: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 (+2% per 50 AP)
ROOT DURATION: 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 / 2

Renewal
MANTRA BONUS: Focused Resolve heals Karma for 20% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of her missing health** upon being cast on an enemy.**
Renewal scales with ranks in Mantra
If the tether is not broken after the 2 seconds, Karma **and any tethered ally** are healed for 20% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of **their **missing health. Focused Resolve's root duration is increased on tethered enemies.

BONUS ROOT DURATION: 0.5 / 0.75 / 1 / 1.25

Changes in bold. 
TL;DR non-mantra'd allies get a damage reduction, allowing her to give large protection to a single target with tether + shield. Mantra'd ally tether provides an allied heal IF they survive until the tether finishes (and stay in range). The mantra version won't give the initial heal but will heal them BOTH for the total of BOTH their missing HP's. The lower they both are the more they'll both get healed. Worth noting that she can't give _herself_ a damage reduction.
